comments.body: I love this idea and it's features
spiders are animals even if they're neutral hostile, so I think they're should be cute baby spiders in the new baby mobs update, and maybe there needs to be a way to breed spiders.
Love this! and it wouldn't be too hard to implement; reskin iron golems and have them protect animals instead of villagers
Great idea, I have a similar idea based on the stone talus in legend of Zelda:breath of the wild

That’s nice but i think They should attack for different reasons like if you are trying to tame a wolf in the forest and you accidentally hit it the golem would hit you AND the wolf would attack you so that would be like the biggest insult to injury ever or just plain overkill.
This is actually why creepers hate players. Players chop down all the forests, so the creepers (ever the Lorax) lose their habitat, become angry, and fight back
That's an awesome idea!
Great I love mobs so they sound great but should be tamable with apples and made of leaves

Clarified subject to help search results.

Thanks for your contribution.

I really like this idea, and its been something that i've thought of for a while. Maybe zombies could even have random skins from random existing players, but with a darker shade and more green.

This post needs some more attention !
Those cats  sort of exist in real life I'm talking about the sphinx cat
Cats in deserts shed off their fur so they aren't so hot
Cats are not afraid of pickles. I hope that was a joke.
I think what they Meant is that cats are scared of cucumbers
Actually it's cucumbers

What do you do with the soul shards?

Anyways I think it would be cooler if this was the Illagers' / Vindicators' version of Iron golem thats always hostile towards villagers and players

Wouldnt like it in my world. Would love it as a mod/addon. Also what do the shards do? I would leave that part out, and he should spawn in an abandon village in a tall tree type forest. As though he was left behind and forgetten/ he failed to protect his village from an attack, and only he was left. That. Would be cool, get some code knowledge it mod it up! This is a great idea! The Forrest could also have its own rusty mineshaft that has bones/skulls and rusted minecarts and rails that break when touched, but may drop some rusty iron, with rusty iron, you could craft rust blocks that u can turn into rust golems if u want some, and u could craft rust with sand to get red sand. And rust + bricks could get u rust colored bricks. That would be cool. I support your idea as a mod!
(FYI, redwood forests have been moved to Previously Considered Feedback upon consultation with the team. ~nb)
it would be better if it were an hostile mob thet lives on zombie villages (it would be nice if they did that zombie villages spawn more commonly)
Also spawn when iron golems are in water?
i hope this comes to the game
Sounds like another boss.  We already have 3, including the elder guardian, and we do not need more.  The elder guardian is too similar to this.

what the... then some people become unhappy when some can say minecraft is for kids! >((((

NO
What we need is a kraken

I like the idea! Maybe making a teleporter with a nether star in the center, 3 iron blocks at the bottom row, and everywhere else endergoo! It would have to be expensive because it would be a very OP item and maybe having a limit to them like no more than 8 or 10.
If this means a totally purple slime-like mob, I approve. No matter if this mob has no practical use! It's for the ornament.
We also need Muscovy ducks, they are very under rated and imo the most adorable
Pls I love ducks
if they add it i hope they let us pick them up and i want them so i can call one for subaru and keep it as my pet
have ducks in minecraft will be a super addition to the game (for ambience...things like this...) and i love ducks plz add them !
i agree we want ducks they so cool yo
I think Pigs should turn into mud pigs when going on mud.
It could be possible with the new drop. So...Good luck!
This will probably make a good challenge for Mr.Beast
Yeees
I made a post about this. You should check it out.
this is a good idea i posted an idea about this
please do it!!
I think that’s a great idea please make it happen
There is already a villager guard. IRON GOLEMS
I don't mean that... there was a mod where villagers had guards with bows and stuff

Yes! I think this would add a deeper sense of depth in lower caves and bigger caves. I think for the great deep, we should not have these creatures. But I think instead, we could have a mining helmet you could craft with some of these glowing plants/creatures that will create a dim light around your player.

If we had a bioluminescent cave biome, that would be incredible!
Just imagine walking through the cave systems and walking into a biome with glowing algae. 
It would add so much atmosphere to see water around you glow as you walk through it.
While also seeing glowing mushrooms and a specialized glowing grass block specific to this biome.
The Glow Squid would be an excellent addition to this biome as well.
Dang, they underrate this post.

Agreed, love to see bioilluminous plants and such, Mushrooms we've had in the overworld but they glow as well as new variants of such, and found in the caves and dark areas, Glow Slime mobs found deeper in the caves, some glow plants too and so on, also glowing ores and spores glowing on the cave walls, so yeah

Beautiful idea. A glowing blue variant of the lush cave where water ripples with ghostly blue light when anything interacts with it. Perhaps strings of glow worms hang from the ceiling, making cave roofs look like a magical night's sky.

It sounds like a great idea of a new mob

Please add it
Suena bien es increible

The mob should be somewhat rare and the enchanted apples should have a .5% drop chance.

Having enchanted apples renewable is overpowered though.
200 minecraft days is a lot so maybe a little less, because 200 times 20 is 4,000, which is 66 hours, which is a little over 3 days, I dont want to act smart but thats a lot
seals could be used for underwater travel!
They should add a lion in a update
harp seals, they are an endangered species that is being hunted by poachers, so they drop nothing when killed,
Also they should clap at you when you are near them.

This is why I hate their push for parity, cause it is almost always "Just make Bedrock match Java" and never "Which does it better". It is so frustrating to see features constantly removed cause they're not on Java
I agree, some Bedrock features are way better.

While bears may seem like the same animal as polar bears or pandas, they are part of a different species. The similarities is equivalent to human and ape, they are related, but extremely different. While I appreciate your idea, I doubt they would add this to the game for several reasons. First, its an animal, not a fantasy creature, and a hostile one too. Second, you need to kill the bear, which is a game mechanic they are currently staying away from. If the bears had some real use, they might consider it.

penguins were last in the 2023 mob vote it would be great to see them again I know you aren't scared to put community vote losers into the game as we've already seen with the copper golem and frog. please consider this
Mojang pls add cool stuff like this to Minecraft
Oohhhh....I love za penguins
YEAH! I think this could improve a lot the quality of the game.
They should glow in the dark, follow the player around, and be known as Nightlights. They would be useful for mining and seeing in the dark.
Would it change colors like toast or have a collar or anything?
OOOH-LA-LA!! I like this!!! I WUV my BUNNY-BUN-BUNS!!!!!!
They could fight creepers...
Can it perch on your shoulder?
